moxie.hamcrest

Class SimpleDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • moxie.hamcrest.SimpleDescription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Description

    public class SimpleDescription
extends Object
implements org.hamcrest.Description
    Provides a simple implementation of the Description interface backed by a StringBuilder.

    Intended as a substitute for Hamcrest's StringDescription - unlike that class this implementation has some bombproofing in case it's fed a value whose toString() method throws an error. This is particularly important when building exception messages for the "real" cause of a test failure - this process should not curtail the test by throwing a second, far more obscure error from the guts of the test framework, leaving the user no wiser as to why their test has failed.
